thread.title: Where are you when we need you, Jean-Paul Sartre? | Politics
thread.title_full: Where are you when we need you, Jean-Paul Sartre? | Politics

author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Where are you when we need you, Jean-Paul Sartre? | Politics
text:
(Before It's News)
Dear Sartre, thank you for refusing the Nobel Prize for Literature in 1964, athough, I must say, Harold Pinter made spectacular use of its pulpit by hurling an uncompromising indictment against the Axis of Good.
